dsiprouter.syncSettings(new_fields={}, update_net=False)[source]¶

Synchronize settings.py with shared mem / db

Parameters

  • new_fields (dict) – fields to override when syncing

  • update_net (bool) – if the network settings should be updated

Returns

None
